'''''A Fish Called Rhodeia''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Meetings in Outrealm: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat an [[Rhodeia of Loch|Oceanid]] in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is a reference to the 1988 film ''{{w|A Fish Called Wanda}}''.
